description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Like Speed? Signup for rocket training here. Fast paced, will leave you realing after every level. Shoot, dodge and boost your way to the finish line. A Hero's welcome awaits the winner back on earth. The loser will spend the night alone glaring at the stars on a lonely village road side.
